mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM moimmember WHERE memberNum = #{memberNum} and cmoimcode = #{cmoimCode}

SELECT c.cmoimCode, comname, isopen, TO_CHAR(created,'YYYY-MM-DD') created, c.catecode, c.regcode, c.memberNum,NVL(membercount, 0) membercount FROM commoim c JOIN (SELECT cmoimCode FROM moimmember WHERE memberNum=#{memberNum}) mm ON c.cmoimCode = mm.cmoimCode LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT cmoimcode, COUNT(*) membercount FROM moimmember GROUP BY cmoimcode ) cnt ON c.cmoimCode = cnt.cmoimCode ORDER BY cmoimcode DESC

SELECT c.cmoimCode, comname, isopen, TO_CHAR(created,'YYYY-MM-DD') created, c.catecode, c.regcode, c.memberNum,NVL(memberCount, 0) memberCount FROM commoim c JOIN member2 m ON c.membernum = m.membernum LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT cmoimcode,COUNT(*) memberCount FROM moimmember GROUP BY cmoimcode ) cnt ON c.cmoimCode = cnt.cmoimCode ORDER BY cmoimcode DESC
